innhold.avsnitt: We recommend that you apply 4-6 weeks before you are entitled to parental benefit.
You cannot apply for parental benefit before the 22nd week of pregnancy. If you already have a date for a planned caesarean, use this date as the estimated date of delivery when you apply.

To apply, log in using your BankID system from your bank or another approved electronic ID. The questions asked in the application are adapted to your situation, and instructions and information are provided as you fill in the form.

lesmer.intro: Do you not have permanent employment?
lesmer.avsnitt: If you are not permanently employed, you must send confirmation of the estimated date of delivery or caesarean to NAV. The expected date of delivery is provided by your midwife or doctor. This must be dated in 22nd week of pregnancy or later.

lesmer.intro: Have you received a severance package, interim pay or been in compulsory military service?
lesmer.avsnitt: You must submit documentation of your income and the period if you have had one of these sources of income:

liste.punkt: compulsory military service or the Norwegian Civil Defence
salary from employer during further or continuing education
